3.27 
Obligation of the spouses to support each other 
1. The spouses have a duty of loyalty and mutual respect, as well as a duty to support each other morally and materially and to contribute to the common needs of the family or of the other spouse, in accordance with the ability of each of them to do so. 
2. If one spouse, for objective reasons, is unable to make a sufficient contribution to the common needs of the family, the other spouse must do so to the best of his or her ability.
